title: Ready Or Not, Here Comes Baseball
description: Hot Takedown previews the return of MLB and the semi-finals of the NWSL Challenge Cup. Plus, a trail running Rabbit Hole.
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
